name: Lumentum Holdings Inc.
description: Lumentum Holdings Inc. is a leading provider of innovative optical and photonic products for a diverse range of applications. Founded in 2015 as a spinoff from JDS Uniphase Corporation, Lumentum has quickly positioned itself as a crucial player in the telecommunications and industrial markets. The company specializes in advanced lasers and optical components that enable high-speed data transmission for telecommunications networks, as well as 3D sensing solutions used in consumer electronics, automotive, and industrial applications. Lumentum's technology is integral to the infrastructure that supports high-bandwidth services, making it a key contributor to the ongoing digital transformation across industries. With a focus on research and development, Lumentum continues to push the boundaries of optical technology, driving advancements in areas such as augmented reality, virtual reality, and autonomous vehicles. The company's mission is to empower its customers with cutting-edge solutions that enhance their capabilities and foster innovation, thereby contributing to a connected world.
